mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.MEMBER_PASSWORD, B.* FROM MEMBERINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN USERSETTING B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID WHERE B.MEMBER_ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERSETTING SET PROFILEIMG = #{profileFileName} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET MEMBER_PASSWORD =#{password}, PASSWORDAUTHSTATUS =#{passwordAuthStatus} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{seq}
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET LOCKMODESTATUS =#{lockSwitchStatus}, LOCKTIME =#{lockTime} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{seq}
